name: 4 Wheel OffRoad Monster Truck
description:
4 Wheel OffRoad Trucking - The Ultimate Challenge is a free racing game with awesome trucks, thrilling graphic designs, rocking musical score, and beautiful game scenes.

4 Wheel OffRoad Trucking has been designed for people of all ages and is especially optimized for iPhone 6, iPhone 6 plus and iPhone 5S.

This game has beautiful locations and tracks that will test your driving skills of a 4 Wheel OffRoad Trucking.
